summary: Although manufacturing has a key role in the U.S. economy, growth in this sector has slowed in recent years. In 2010, Congress created a loan guarantee program aimed at bolstering technological innovation among small- and medium-sized U.S. manufacturers. We found the Department of Commerce, which is charged with implementing this program, has not done so. Commerce officials told us: It would be difficult to implement...
title: Innovative Technologies in Manufacturing: Commerce Has No Plans to Implement the Program
